00043 void PhysicsObject::setVelocity(Point3 toSet) {
00044     vel = toSet;
00045     if (vel.getMag() > maxVel) {
00046         vel = vel.getUnit() * maxVel;
00047     }
00048 }
00049 
00050 void PhysicsObject::addVelocity(Point3 toAdd) {
00051     vel = vel + toAdd;
00052     if (vel.getMag() > maxVel) {
00053         vel = vel.getUnit() * maxVel;
00054     }
00055 }
00056 
00057 int PhysicsObject::addForce(Path<Point3> toAdd) {
00058     forces.insert(std::pair<int, Path<Point3> >(currentIdNumber, toAdd));
00059     currentIdNumber++;
00060     return currentIdNumber - 1;
00061 }
00062 
00063 Path<Point3>* PhysicsObject::getForceRef(int id) {
00064     std::map<int, Path<Point3> >::iterator iter = forces.find(id);
00065     if (iter != forces.end()) {
00066         return &(iter->second);
00067     } else {
00068         return NULL;
00069     }
00070 }
00071 
00072 void PhysicsObject::addGravity(Point3 down) {
00073     Path<Point3> gravity(0,1000);
00074     gravity.addPoint(down.getUnit()*9.8*mass);
00075     gravity.makeCyclic();
00076     forces.insert(std::pair<int, Path<Point3> >(currentIdNumber, gravity));
00077     currentIdNumber++;
00078 }
00079 
00080 bool PhysicsObject::removeForce(int id) {
00081     std::map<int, Path<Point3> >::iterator iter = forces.find(id);
00082     if (iter != forces.end()) {
00083         forces.erase(iter);
00084         return true;
00085     } else {
00086         return false;
00087     }
00088 }
00089 
00090 void PhysicsObject::updateTick(int increment) {
00091     lastPos = pos;
00092     pos = pos + vel * (increment/1000.0);
00093     center = pos - offset;
00094     Error::log("Updating tick %f,%f,%f", vel.x, vel.y, vel.z);
00095 }
00096 
00097 void PhysicsObject::updatePosition(int currentTime) {
00098     lastPos = pos;
00099     for (int i = lastUpdated - lastUpdated%increment; i < currentTime - currentTime%increment; i+= increment) {
00100         pos = pos + vel * (increment/1000.0);
00101     }
00102     center = pos - offset;
00103     //Error::debug("PhysicsObject::Updated! Offset is <%f, %f, %f>, center = <%f, %f, %f>, pos = <%f, %f, %f>\n", offset.x, offset.y, offset.z, center.x, center.y, center.z, pos.x, pos.y, pos.z);
00104 }
00105 
00106 void PhysicsObject::resetPosition(int currentTime) {
00107     pos = lastPos;
00108     center = pos - offset;
00109 }
00110 
00111 void PhysicsObject::updateVel(int currentTime) {
00112     for (int i = lastUpdated - lastUpdated%increment; i < currentTime - currentTime%increment; i+= increment) {
00113         vel = vel + acc * (increment/1000.0);
00114         if (vel.getMag() > maxVel) {
00115             vel = vel.getUnit() * maxVel;
00116         }
00117     }
00118 }
00119 
00120 void PhysicsObject::updateAcc(int currentTime) {
00121     for (int i = lastUpdated - lastUpdated%increment; i < currentTime - currentTime%increment; i+= increment) {
00122         acc = Point3(0,0,0);
00123         for (std::map<int, Path<Point3> >::iterator i = forces.begin(); i != forces.end(); i++) {
00124             acc = acc + i->second.getPoint()/mass;
00125         }
00126     }
00127 }
